```{r, echo = FALSE}
#######################
## Get Project Paths ##
#######################
path_project <- getwd()
while (length(grep("test", path_project))>0) path_project <- dirname(path_project)
project_name <-  gsub(".Rcheck$", "", basename(path_project))


####################
## Construct URLs ##
####################
travis_url <- paste0("https://travis-ci.org/tidylab/", project_name)
pipeline_url <- paste0(travis_url, ".svg?branch=master")

codecov_url <- paste0("https://travis-ci.org/tidylab/", project_name)
covr_url <- paste0(codecov_url, "/branch/master/graph/badge.svg")
```
